U.S.A EPA recognises Hyundai's lineup for its fuel economyHyundai was noted as second only to Tesla's all-electric lineup with the highest fuel economy of any mainstream automaker.➡️ Read itHERE!👉🏻 React with 🔥 if you love cars with good fuel economy!

My mother tells me it’s better late than never.
Hi guys Im going to test drive at a couple of dealerships next week. Im going with my cousin as this is my first time looking at cars irl. Can anyone share any insights on what wil happen
They will pressure you and say better sign up now because next bid sure go up. Better take some time and think through probably and not buy a particular car because of extra 1-2k voucher.
I see. How long will the test drive be
you dont have to worry about this. you will be strictly guided on the test drive just ask them
please spend your time thinking about things that actually matter like how much you are willing to spend  what you want exactly in a car. so you dont get duped into a sale you didnt actually want
That pretty much sums up what's gonna happen lol
Yah  and remember they dun put such breakdown that you need to pay one:1. Down-payment2. Insurance3. Road tax4. 1st instalment5. Licence plate (I think $100?)
So you really gotta do the maths  if need to squeeze  then go for other brand or model
I think it depends on whether the showroom is crowded
Hahahaha won't buy used one given the hype 😂
Insurance make sure free towing  loss of use/replacement car. I kena scam by my dealer  never fight for these stuff for me so quite sian when accident
This one can just join AAS
Have fun! 😂 dun sign immediately
go go go update us what u buy
Not buying la haha just viewing
Take pics (of the girls and the price breakdown) 🤣
I more interested in the price of the cars though 😂
If you didn't take full loan  you can consider especially if coe drop further

no leh. personal. try try only and then tio lor
